summary: REQ-1, REQ-2, and REQ-3 appear implemented via updates to TopNav, HeroSection, and ApplicationsSection image references. REQ-4 cannot be verified as satisfied because no new image files were added under frontend/public/assets/generated in the provided diff summary (only React component references changed).

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the new generated images to `frontend/public/assets/generated` with the exact filenames specified and reference them directly from React components.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no added files and does not list any modifications/additions under `frontend/public/assets/generated`, so the presence of the required image assets cannot be confirmed.
evidence: File diff summary: Added: 0, Modified: 5, Removed: 0

hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 only requested updating the images for “Metro & Railway Stations”, “Public Buildings”, “Walls & Facades”, and “Urban Furniture”. The diff shows additional image paths for two other cards that were not requested.
